Topic.Title: Can i make continue link dissapear?

Posts.EditableText:
I want to make the continue link, that disappears after being clicked.
Is it possible?
Posts.HTML:
I want to make the continue link, that disappears after being clicked.
Is it possible?

Posts.EditableText: I think it should do that anyway...
Posts.HTML: I think it should do that anyway...

Posts.EditableText: You mean so you won't see it as part of your text when you scroll back up?
Posts.HTML: You mean so you won't see it as part of your text when you scroll back up?

Posts.EditableText: Yep. You get the link into a label and then when clicked, first line in the section you go should be @replace making the label content just empty.
Posts.HTML: Yep. You get the link into a label and then when clicked, first line in the section you go should be @replace making the label content just empty.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks. It looks a bit ugly, but it works.
Posts.HTML: Thanks. It looks a bit ugly, but it works.
